valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 10 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 11 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low east Faeroes 965 losing its identity by midday tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
Southwesterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first, decreasing 3 to 5 later.
Sea state
Rough or very rough, occasionally high at first, becoming rough later.
Weather
Rain.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor.
